name: star-wars-libray-kaipo
description: Star Wars Library is a Full-Stack MERN project showcasing a library of star wars characters, worlds, specices, and more. Currently, only characters functionality is available until future updates where other models will be added.
author: Kaipo Wilmeth <kaipojames12@gmail.com>

scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && npm start" "cd client && npm start"
